title: Two Men In Magda's Life
description: Magda finds herself catapulted to responsibility after her father gets a UTD. As the only and beloved daughter, she has to fight against the powerful illness and the marauding spirits that want to wipe her family out. Will she rise to the challenge? This is Book I of Two Men in Magda's Life Trilogy. Enjoy
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana
